languages.text: "Новое сообщение от господина Скаландра, Лорд-капитан. На этот раз — не об очередной атаке, а о предполагаемом месте пребывания одного из лидеров ксеносов. Помощники Ахиллеаса сообщили, что предводитель возглавит атаку на райский мир Грантис. Есть небольшой нюанс — он принадлежит Каллигосу Винтерскейлу, другому Вольному Торговцу".

traits.locale_text: "Новое сообщение от господина Скаландра, Лорд-капитан. На этот раз — не об очередной атаке, а о предполагаемом месте пребывания одного из лидеров ксеносов. Помощники Ахиллеаса сообщили, что предводитель возглавит атаку на мир удовольствий Грантис. Есть небольшой нюанс — он принадлежит Каллигосу Винтерскейлу, другому Вольному Торговцу".

languages.text: "A new message from Master Scalander, Lord Captain. This time he is not reporting yet another attack but the alleged location of one of the xenos leaders. Achilleas's aides have reported that said leader will be heading an attack on the paradise world Grantis. There is one catch — the planet belongs to Calligos Winterscale, another Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Новое сообщение от господина Скаландра, Лорд-капитан. На этот раз — не об очередной атаке, а о предполагаемом месте пребывания одного из лидеров ксеносов. Помощники Ахиллеаса сообщили, что предводитель возглавит атаку на райский мир Грантис. Есть небольшой нюанс — он принадлежит Каллигосу Винтерскейлу, другому Вольному Торговцу".

traits.locale_text: "A new message from master Scalander, Lord Captain. This time he is not reporting yet another xeno attack but is informing us about an alleged location of one of the alien leaders. Achilleas' aides have reported said leader will be heading an attack on Pleasure World Grantis. There is a little catch — it belongs to Calligos Winterscale, another Rogue Trader."

"A new message from master Scalander, Lord Captain. This time he is not reporting yet another xeno attack but is informing us about an alleged location of one of the alien leaders. Achilleas' aides have reported said leader will be heading an attack on Pleasure World Grantis. There is a little catch — it belongs to Calligos Winterscale, another Rogue Trader."

"A new message from Master Scalander, Lord Captain. This time he is not reporting yet another attack but the alleged location of one of the xenos leaders. Achilleas's aides have reported that said leader will be heading an attack on the pleasure world Grantis. There is one catch — the planet belongs to Calligos Winterscale, another Rogue Trader."

"A new message from Master Scalander, Lord Captain. This time he is not reporting yet another attack but the alleged location of one of the xenos leaders. Achilleas's aides have reported that said leader will be heading an attack on the pleasure world Grantis. There is one catch — the planet belongs to Calligos Winterscale, another Rogue Trader."

"A new message from Master Scalander, Lord Captain. This time he is not reporting yet another attack but the alleged location of one of the xenos leaders. Achilleas's aides have reported that said leader will be heading an attack on the paradise world Grantis. There is one catch — the planet belongs to Calligos Winterscale, another Rogue Trader."

languages.text: “舰长大人，斯卡兰德大师发来了新的信息。这一次，他的报告内容并不是关于异形的袭击，而是某位异形首领的位置。阿吉里亚斯的助手报告说，这位异形首领将会袭击天堂世界格兰蒂斯。不过有个问题，那颗行星的主人是卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔，另一位行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "A new message from Master Scalander, Lord Captain. This time he is not reporting yet another attack but the alleged location of one of the xenos leaders. Achilleas's aides have reported that said leader will be heading an attack on the paradise world Grantis. There is one catch — the planet belongs to Calligos Winterscale, another Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，斯卡兰德大师发来了新的信息。这一次，他的报告内容并不是关于异形的袭击，而是某位异形首领的位置。阿吉里亚斯的助手报告说，这位异形首领将会袭击天堂世界格兰蒂斯。不过有个问题，那颗行星的主人是卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔，另一位行商浪人。”

languages.text: «Un nuevo mensaje del maestro Scalander, Lord Capitán. Esta vez no informa de un nuevo ataque, sino de la posible ubicación de uno de los líderes xenos. Los ayudantes de Achilleas están convencidos de que dicho líder estará a la vanguardia de un ataque contra el mundo paraíso Grantis. El problema radica en que el planeta es propiedad de Calligos Winterscale, otro Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "A new message from Master Scalander, Lord Captain. This time he is not reporting yet another attack but the alleged location of one of the xenos leaders. Achilleas's aides have reported that said leader will be heading an attack on the paradise world Grantis. There is one catch — the planet belongs to Calligos Winterscale, another Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Un nuevo mensaje del maestro Scalander, Lord Capitán. Esta vez no informa de un nuevo ataque, sino de la posible ubicación de uno de los líderes xenos. Los ayudantes de Achilleas están convencidos de que dicho líder estará a la vanguardia de un ataque contra el mundo paraíso Grantis. El problema radica en que el planeta es propiedad de Calligos Winterscale, otro Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: "Eine neue Nachricht von Meister Scalander, Lord Captain. Diesmal meldet er nicht einen weiteren Angriff, sondern den angeblichen Aufenthaltsort eines der Xenos-Anführer. Achilleas' Adjutanten haben berichtet, dass dieser Anführer einen Angriff auf die Paradieswelt Grantis leiten wird. Die Sache hat nur einen Haken – der Planet gehört Calligos Winterzunder, {mf|einem weiteren Freihändler|einer weiteren Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "A new message from Master Scalander, Lord Captain. This time he is not reporting yet another attack but the alleged location of one of the xenos leaders. Achilleas's aides have reported that said leader will be heading an attack on the paradise world Grantis. There is one catch — the planet belongs to Calligos Winterscale, another Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "A new message from Master Scalander, Lord Captain. This time he is not reporting yet another attack but the alleged location of one of the xenos leaders. Achilleas's aides have reported that said leader will be heading an attack on the paradise world Grantis. There is one catch — the planet belongs to Calligos Winterscale, another Rogue Trader."

languages.text: « Nous avons reçu un nouveau message de maître Scalander, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et cette fois, il ne nous communique pas simplement la préparation d'une nouvelle attaque, mais aussi la position d'un des chefs xénos. Les assistants d'Achilleas ont déterminé que cette cible de choix commandera en personne un assaut contre le monde-paradis de Grantis. Mais il y a un hic : la planète appartient à Calligos Winterscale, un autre libre-marchand. »
languages.original_text: "A new message from Master Scalander, Lord Captain. This time he is not reporting yet another attack but the alleged location of one of the xenos leaders. Achilleas's aides have reported that said leader will be heading an attack on the paradise world Grantis. There is one catch — the planet belongs to Calligos Winterscale, another Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons reçu un nouveau message de maître Scalander, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Et cette fois, il ne nous communique pas simplement la préparation d'une nouvelle attaque, mais aussi la position d'un des chefs xénos. Les assistants d'Achilleas ont déterminé que cette cible de choix commandera en personne un assaut contre le monde paradis de Grantis. Mais il y a un hic : la planète appartient à Calligos Winterscale, un autre libre-marchand. »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、スカランダー殿から新しいメッセージが届きました。今回は新たな襲撃情報ではなく、とある異種族のリーダーの推定位置の報告です。アキレアスの側近の報告では、そのリーダーは楽園惑星グランティスへの襲撃を企てているとか。ただ問題がひとつ…この惑星の所有者はカリゴス・ウィンタースケール、別の自由開拓者です」
languages.original_text: "A new message from Master Scalander, Lord Captain. This time he is not reporting yet another attack but the alleged location of one of the xenos leaders. Achilleas's aides have reported that said leader will be heading an attack on the paradise world Grantis. There is one catch — the planet belongs to Calligos Winterscale, another Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、スカランダー殿から新しいメッセージが届きました。今回は新たな襲撃情報ではなく、とある異種族のリーダーの推定位置の報告です。アキレアスの側近の報告では、そのリーダーは楽園惑星グランティスへの襲撃を企てているとか。ただ問題がひとつ…この惑星の所有者はカリゴス・ウィンタースケール、別の自由開拓者です」

languages.text: "Üstat Scalander'dan yeni bir mesaj var Lord Kaptan. Bu kez başka bir saldırının değil de zeno liderlerinden birinin olası konumunu iletiyor. Achilleas'ın emir erleri, söz konusu liderin cennet dünya Grantis'e saldırmaya gideceğinin raporunu vermiş. Yalnız sorun şu ki bu gezegen; bir başka Hür Tacir'e, Calligos Winterscale'e ait."
languages.original_text: "A new message from Master Scalander, Lord Captain. This time he is not reporting yet another attack but the alleged location of one of the xenos leaders. Achilleas's aides have reported that said leader will be heading an attack on the paradise world Grantis. There is one catch — the planet belongs to Calligos Winterscale, another Rogue Trader."
